verses.verse: אִם־ <WH518> If תָּשׁ֨וּב <WH7725> If thou wilt return יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל ׀ <WH3478> O Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to תָּשׁ֑וּב <WH7725> return וְאִם־ <WH518> and if תָּסִ֧יר <WH5493> unto me and if thou wilt put away שִׁקּוּצֶ֛יךָ <WH8251> thine abominations מִפָּנַ֖י <WH6440> out of my sight וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not תָנֽוּד׃ <WH5110> then shalt thou not remove

וְנִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH7650> And thou shalt swear חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD בֶּאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> in truth בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> in judgment וּבִצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> and in righteousness וְהִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <WH1288> shall bless ב֛וֹ גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> and the nations וּב֥וֹ יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <WH1984> themselves in him and in him shall they glory ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וְלִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem נִ֥ירוּ <WH5214> Break up לָכֶ֖ם נִ֑יר <WH5215> your fallow ground וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּזְרְע֖וּ <WH2232> and sow אֶל־ <WH413> among קוֹצִֽים׃ <WH6975> not among thorns

הִמֹּ֣לוּ <WH4135> Circumcise לַיהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> yourselves to the LORD וְהָסִ֙רוּ֙ <WH5493> and take away עָרְל֣וֹת <WH6190> the foreskins לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> of your heart אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ye men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or תֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> come forth כָאֵ֜שׁ <WH784> like fire חֲמָתִ֗י <WH2534> lest my fury וּבָעֲרָה֙ <WH1197> and burn וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> none מְכַבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> that none can quench מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> [it] because רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> of the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4611> of your doings

הַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> Declare בִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye in Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> in Jerusalem הַשְׁמִ֔יעוּ <WH8085> and publish וְאִמְר֕וּ <WH559> and say [ותִּקְעוּ כ] (תִּקְע֥וּ <WH8628> blow ק) שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> ye the trumpet בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land קִרְא֤וּ <WH7121> cry מַלְאוּ֙ <WH4390> gather together וְאִמְר֔וּ <WH559> and say הֵאָסְפ֥וּ <WH622> Assemble וְנָב֖וֹאָה <WH935> yourselves and let us go אֶל־ <WH413> about עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> into the defenced

שְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> Set up נֵ֣ס <WH5251> the standard צִיּ֔וֹנָה <WH6726> toward Zion הָעִ֖יזוּ <WH5756> retire אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹ֑דוּ <WH5975> stay כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> evil אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> not for I will bring מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> from the north וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and a great

עָלָ֤ה <WH5927> is come up אַרְיֵה֙ <WH738> The lion מִֽסֻּבְּכ֔וֹ <WH5441> from his thicket וּמַשְׁחִ֣ית <WH7843> and the destroyer גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles נָסַ֖ע <WH5265> is on his way יָצָ֣א <WH3318> he is gone forth מִמְּקֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> from his place לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> to make אַרְצֵךְ֙ <WH776> thy land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> desolate עָרַ֥יִךְ <WH5892> [and] thy cities תִּצֶּ֖ינָה <WH5327> shall be laid waste מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> Without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> without an inhabitant

עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise חִגְר֥וּ <WH2296> For this gird שַׂקִּ֖ים <WH8242> you with sackcloth סִפְד֣וּ <WH5594> lament וְהֵילִ֑ילוּ <WH3213> and howl כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> has not שָׁ֛ב <WH7725> is not turned back חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> for the fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at פ

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> shall come בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> And it shall come to pass at that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD יֹאבַ֥ד <WH6> shall perish לֵב־ <WH3820> [that] the heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וְלֵ֣ב <WH3820> and the heart הַשָּׂרִ֑ים <WH8269> of the princes וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> shall be astonished הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> and the priests וְהַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> and the prophets יִתְמָֽהוּ׃ <WH8539> shall wonder

וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> Then said אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <WH162> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אָכֵן֩ <WH403> surely הַשֵּׁ֨א <WH5377> thou hast greatly הִשֵּׁ֜אתָ <WH5377> deceived לָעָ֤ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וְלִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> Ye shall have peace יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֑ם וְנָגְעָ֥ה <WH5060> reacheth חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> whereas the sword עַד־ <WH5704> against הַנָּֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> unto the soul

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> it יֵאָמֵ֤ר <WH559> shall it be said לָֽעָם־ <WH5971> to this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> to this וְלִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and to Jerusalem ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> wind צַ֤ח <WH6703> A dry שְׁפָיִים֙ <WH8205> of the high places בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> toward בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people ל֥וֹא <WH3808> not לִזְר֖וֹת <WH2219> not to fan וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> and not לְהָבַֽר׃ <WH1305> nor to cleanse

ר֧וּחַ <WH7307> wind מָלֵ֛א <WH4392> [Even] a full מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> this יָ֣בוֹא <WH935> from those [places] shall come לִ֑י עַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now גַּם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> unto me now also will I give מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> sentence אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH854> for

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold כַּעֲנָנִ֣ים <WH6051> as clouds יַעֲלֶ֗ה <WH5927> Behold he shall come up וְכַסּוּפָה֙ <WH5492> [shall be] as a whirlwind מַרְכְּבוֹתָ֔יו <WH4818> and his chariots קַלּ֥וּ <WH7043> are swifter מִנְּשָׁרִ֖ים <WH5404> than eagles סוּסָ֑יו <WH5483> his horses א֥וֹי <WH188> Woe לָ֖נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדָּֽדְנוּ׃ <WH7703> unto us for we are spoiled

כַּבְּסִ֨י <WH3526> wash מֵרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> from wickedness לִבֵּךְ֙ <WH3820> thine heart יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> that תִּוָּשֵׁ֑עִי <WH3467> that thou mayest be saved עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֛י <WH4970> How תָּלִ֥ין <WH3885> lodge בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <WH7130> within מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת <WH4284> thoughts אוֹנֵֽךְ׃ <WH205> How long shall thy vain

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For ק֥וֹל <WH6963> For a voice מַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> declareth מִדָּ֑ן <WH1835> from Dan וּמַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <WH8085> and publisheth אָ֖וֶן <WH205> affliction מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> from mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim

הַזְכִּ֣ירוּ <WH2142> Make ye mention לַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> to the nations הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> now הַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <WH8085> behold publish עַל־ <WH5921> over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem נֹצְרִ֥ים <WH5341> [that] watchers בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country הַמֶּרְחָ֑ק <WH4801> from a far וַֽיִּתְּנ֛וּ <WH5414> and give out עַל־ <WH5921> against עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> against the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah קוֹלָֽם׃ <WH6963> their voice

כְּשֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> As keepers שָׂדַ֔י <WH7704> of a field הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> are against מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> are they against her round about כִּי־ <WH3588> Because אֹתִ֥י <WH853> מָרָ֖תָה <WH4784> because she hath been rebellious נְאֻם־ <WH5002> against me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

דַּרְכֵּךְ֙ <WH1870> Thy way וּמַ֣עֲלָלַ֔יִךְ <WH4611> and thy doings עָשׂ֥וֹ <WH6213> have procured אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לָ֑ךְ זֹ֤את <WH2063> this thy רָעָתֵךְ֙ <WH7451> these [things] unto thee this [is] thy wickedness כִּ֣י <WH3588> How מָ֔ר <WH4751> because it is bitter כִּ֥י <WH3588> How נָגַ֖ע <WH5060> because it reacheth עַד־ <WH5704> against לִבֵּֽךְ׃ <WH3820> unto thine heart ס

מֵעַ֣י ׀ <WH4578> My bowels מֵעַ֨י ׀ <WH4578> my bowels [אָחוּלָה כ] (אֹוחִ֜ילָה <WH2342> bear ק) קִיר֥וֹת <WH7023> at my very לִבִּ֛י <WH3820> heart הֹֽמֶה־ <WH1993> maketh a noise לִּ֥י לִבִּ֖י <WH3820> my heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot אַחֲרִ֑ישׁ <WH2790> in me I cannot hold my peace כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the sound שׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> of the trumpet [שָׁמַעְתִּי כ] (שָׁמַ֣עַתְּ <WH8085> listen ק) נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> O my soul תְּרוּעַ֖ת <WH8643> the alarm מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war

שֶׁ֤בֶר <WH7667> Destruction עַל־ <WH5921> on שֶׁ֙בֶר֙ <WH7667> upon destruction נִקְרָ֔א <WH7121> is cried כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <WH7703> is spoiled כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> for the whole land פִּתְאֹם֙ <WH6597> suddenly שֻׁדְּד֣וּ <WH7703> spoiled אֹהָלַ֔י <WH168> are my tents רֶ֖גַע <WH7281> in a moment יְרִיעֹתָֽי׃ <WH3407> [and] my curtains
עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How אֶרְאֶה־ <WH7200> How long shall I see נֵּ֑ס <WH5251> the standard אֶשְׁמְעָ֖ה <WH8085> [and] hear ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> cornet ס

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אֱוִ֣יל <WH191> [is] foolish עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> For my people אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> they have not known בָּנִ֤ים <WH1121> children סְכָלִים֙ <WH5530> me they [are] sottish הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no נְבוֹנִ֖ים <WH995> and they have none understanding הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> They חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> they [are] wise הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like לְהָרַ֔ע <WH7489> to do evil וּלְהֵיטִ֖יב <WH3190> but to do good לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יָדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> they have no knowledge

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I beheld אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold תֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> and lo [it was] without form וָבֹ֑הוּ <WH922> and void וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> and the heavens וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> had אוֹרָֽם׃ <WH216> and they [had] no light

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I beheld הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> the mountains וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold רֹעֲשִׁ֑ים <WH7493> and lo they trembled וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> and all the hills הִתְקַלְקָֽלוּ׃ <WH7043> moved lightly

רָאִ֕יתִי <WH7200> I beheld וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold אֵ֣ין <WH369> there הָאָדָ֑ם <WH120> and lo [there was] no man וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all ע֥וֹף <WH5775> and all the birds הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the heavens נָדָֽדוּ׃ <WH5074> were fled

רָאִ֕יתִי <WH7200> I beheld וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold הַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3759> and lo the fruitful place הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> [was] a wilderness וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עָרָ֗יו <WH5892> and all the cities נִתְּצוּ֙ <WH5422> thereof were broken down מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> at the presence יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> [and] by his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> anger ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> For thus hath the LORD שְׁמָמָ֥ה <WH8077> shall be desolate תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> The whole land וְכָלָ֖ה <WH3617> a full end לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> yet will I not make

עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <WH56> mourn הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> For this shall the earth וְקָדְר֥וּ <WH6937> be black הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> and the heavens מִמָּ֑עַל <WH4605> above עַ֤ל <WH5921> and כִּי־ <WH3588> for דִבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> because I have spoken זַמֹּ֔תִי <WH2161> [it] I have purposed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor נִחַ֖מְתִּי <WH5162> [it] and will not repent וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor אָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> neither will I turn back מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> At
